biolockj.util

Class DownloadUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.DownloadUtil

  • public final class DownloadUtil
extends Object
    This utility is used to validate the metadata to help ensure the format is valid R script input.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String DOWNLOAD_DIR
      Config String property: "pipeline.downloadDir"
      Sets the local directory targeted by the scp command.
      static String DOWNLOAD_LIST
      Name of the file holding the list of pipeline files to include when running DownloadUtil

    • Method Detail

      • getDownloadCmd

        public static String getDownloadCmd()
                             throws Exception
        If running on cluster, build command for user to download pipeline analysis.

        The pipeline analysis is extracted from the last module output directory (except Email).
        Download target = ModuleUtil.getDownloadDir() on the local workstation.
        Example download command: scp -rp johnDoe@myUniversity.usa.edu:"dir1, dir2, file1" /Users/johnDoe/projects/downloads

        Returns:
        String (scp command) or null
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config parameters are missing or invalid

      • getDownloadDirPath

        public static String getDownloadDirPath()
        Get validated Config."pipeline.downloadDir" if running on cluster, otherwise return null
        Returns:
        String download directory file or null

      • getDownloadListFile

        public static File getDownloadListFile()
        Get the download list file.
        Returns:
        File containing list of files to download

      • buildDownloadList

        protected static List<File> buildDownloadList(Collection<File> files)
                                       throws Exception
        Add files to "downloadList.txt" in pipeline root directory.
        Parameters:
        files - - files to add to the download list
        Returns:
        List of files for download
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getClusterUser

        protected static String getClusterUser()
        If System.user.home is a file path (like /usr/home/johnDoe), return last directory name (johnDoe). Otherwise return System.user.home value.
        Returns:
        The userId

      • getDirFilter

        protected static org.apache.commons.io.filefilter.IOFileFilter getDirFilter(boolean includeOutput,
                                                                            boolean includeScript,
                                                                            boolean includeTemp)
        Get a directory name filter to include module sub-directories.
        Parameters:
        includeOutput - include the output directory
        includeScript - include the script directory
        includeTemp - include the temp directory
        Returns:
        a file name filter

      • getDownloadModules

        protected static List<BioModule> getDownloadModules()
        Get the modules to download. The following are downloaded if found in the pipeline:
        • AddMetadataToTaxaTables
        • AddMetadataToPathwayTables
        • JsonReport
        • Any module that inherits from R_Module
        If pipeline contains R_PlotEffectSize and Config."r_PlotEffectSize.disableFoldChange"="N" include additional modules:
        • Humann2Parser
        • BuildTaxaTables
        Returns:
        BioModules to download

      • getDownloadSize

        protected static BigInteger getDownloadSize(List<File> files)
        Get the total size of all files included for download.
        Parameters:
        files - List of download files
        Returns:
        BigInteger total download size

      • makeRunAllScript

        protected static File makeRunAllScript(List<BioModule> modules)
                                throws Exception
        This script allows a user to run all R scripts together from a single script.
        Parameters:
        modules - BioModules
        Returns:
        File Run_All.R script
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur
